fixed_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 129.1/135.6/142.0% of Attack.
fixed_skill.name: Power Slash

innate_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 6.5% when surrounded by enemies.
innate_skill.name: Adverse Resolve II

innate_skill.desc: Restores 2.7% of max HP at the start of each turn.
innate_skill.name: Regenerate II

innate_skill.desc: At the start of battle, increase party's Attack by 6% for 2 turns or until user changes Personas.
innate_skill.name: Auto-Mataru II

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical damage by 10.5%. When attacking foes with less than 50% HP, increase Physical damage by 43%.
passive_skill.name: Feast of Atrocities

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical damage by 10.5%. When attacking foes with less than 50% HP, increase Physical damage by 50%.
passive_skill.name: Feast of Atrocities I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 360.0%/385.2%/410.4% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
